articles.title: Six-year-old boy found in Vietnam forest after five days
articles.description: Dang Tien Lam was found by locals who heard a child's cries while they were farming near the forest.
articles.content:
"I'm so tired, I can't stand up, please carry me up," Lam said, according to 52-year-old farmer Ly Van Nang. 
Lam survived on leaves, wild fruits and streamwater, reports said.
